meanings.definition: A Polish monetary unit equal to 1/100 of a zloty.
meanings.sent1: In Poland, you can buy candies for a few groszy.
meanings.sent2: She paid for the toy with a handful of groszy.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel saved up groszy to buy a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were worth more than a million groszy.
meanings.sent5: The old man's pockets jingled with groszy as he walked.
